categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Roll-On was the name given to the R2 astromech droid used by Wedge Antilles as of 43.5 ABY. He was present when Antilles assisted during a hasty operation to prevent the destruction of Kessel.
Partway through the mission, Wedge lent control of his X-wing and Roll-On to Rhysati Ynr who, in turn, let Antilles borrow her Eta-5 interceptor.
